name: Ommegang Brewery
visitor_experience: Tours, tastings, café, concerts, and seasonal events.
description: A renowned Belgian-inspired brewery with scenic grounds and a major role in the upstate craft beer scene.

name: Saranac Brewery (Matt Brewing Company)
specialty: Wide variety including lagers, IPAs, and root beer
visitor_experience: Historic tours, tastings, beer garden, and concerts.
description: One of the oldest breweries in New York State, known for its rich history and wide-ranging beer portfolio.

name: Genesee Brewing Company
specialty: Classic American lagers and Cream Ale
visitor_experience: Brew house museum, taproom, and scenic views of High Falls.
description: A staple of NY beer heritage, producing iconic Cream Ale and accessible classics.

name: Brown’s Brewing Company
specialty: Ales and lagers with seasonal rotations
visitor_experience: Brewpub with Hudson River views, live music, and full dining menu.
description: Among the pioneers of the craft beer renaissance in the Capital Region.

name: Druthers Brewing Company
specialty: IPAs, lagers, and experimental seasonal brews
visitor_experience: Brewpubs in Saratoga, Albany, and Schenectady with dining and events.
description: A modern brewpub group with popular community-focused spaces across upstate.

name: Southern Tier Brewing Company
visitor_experience: Large taproom, tours, and seasonal outdoor events.
description: Nationally recognized for bold IPAs and dessert-inspired stouts.

name: Ithaca Beer Company
specialty: Flower Power IPA and rotating craft lineup
visitor_experience: Taproom, beer garden, brewery tours, and farm-to-table restaurant.
description: One of NY’s best-known craft breweries, rooted in the Finger Lakes region.

name: Woodstock Brewing
specialty: IPAs, sours, and creative small-batch beers
visitor_experience: Taproom with rotating taps, food, and live events.
description: A vibrant Catskills brewery with a community feel and adventurous beer styles.

name: Common Roots Brewing Company
visitor_experience: Taproom, food service, and events; rebuilt after 2019 fire.
description: Known for resilience and innovation, with a strong community ethos.

name: Nine Pin Ciderworks
visitor_experience: Taproom with rotating ciders, tours, and food pairings.
description: New York’s first licensed farm cidery, pioneering craft cider culture in the state.

name: Equilibrium Brewery
visitor_experience: Taproom, beer garden, and food truck rotations.
description: Widely acclaimed for juicy, hazy IPAs and innovative dark beers.

name: Suarez Family Brewery
visitor_experience: Relaxed tasting room with pastoral Hudson Valley setting.
description: Known for delicate, balanced beers; one of NY’s most respected small breweries.

name: Plan Bee Farm Brewery
visitor_experience: Farm-based taproom with outdoor seating and events.
description: Dedicated to using only NY-grown ingredients, with a strong terroir focus.

name: Hudson Valley Brewery
visitor_experience: Industrial-chic taproom with rotating beers and art shows.
description: Renowned for pushing boundaries with sour IPAs and fruited sours.

name: Catskill Brewery
visitor_experience: Eco-friendly brewery with rustic tasting room.
description: A Catskills favorite with an environmentally sustainable ethos.

name: Rare Form Brewing Company
visitor_experience: Eclectic taproom in downtown Troy.
description: Creative brewery exploring unique flavor combinations and styles.

name: Rushing Duck Brewing Company
visitor_experience: Taproom with rotating food trucks and events.
description: A Hudson Valley staple with a loyal following for bold, flavorful beers.

name: Barrier Brewing Co.
visitor_experience: Taproom and limited tours.
description: One of Long Island’s most respected craft breweries with broad distribution.

name: Crossroads Brewing Company
specialty: Lagers, pale ales, and seasonal specialties
visitor_experience: Brewpub in historic brick building, plus Catskill Taproom.
description: Community-oriented brewery with classic and seasonal offerings.

name: Big Ditch Brewing Company
specialty: Hayburner IPA and other hop-forward beers
visitor_experience: Large taproom and restaurant in downtown Buffalo.
description: Prominent Buffalo brewery with a focus on hop-forward, drinkable beers.

name: Resurgence Brewing Company
specialty: IPAs, cream ales, and fruited sours
visitor_experience: Taproom, beer garden, and events venue.
description: Known for creative beers and major presence in Buffalo’s beer scene.

name: Prison City Pub & Brewery
visitor_experience: Taproom, restaurant, and outdoor beer garden.
description: Nationally recognized for hazy IPAs and innovative dark beers.

name: Community Beer Works
visitor_experience: Taproom with rotating taps, events, and food pop-ups.
description: Community-focused brewery with a mission of inclusivity and collaboration.

name: Swiftwater Brewing Company
visitor_experience: Taproom with food menu and rotating taps.
description: A Rochester favorite blending farmhouse traditions with modern craft.

name: Grimm Artisanal Ales (Upstate Taproom)
visitor_experience: Rustic tasting room and experimental brewery.
description: Cutting-edge Brooklyn brewery with upstate presence in the Hudson Valley.
